item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

August 29, 2011's location is:

Koji - New Haven

Late night sushi bar Koji opened just over a year ago on Temple Street in downtown New Haven. The bar offers specialty cocktails, saki, beer and wine. The food menu offers more than just sushi, but several Asian dishes with a twist and many reasonably priced. Some of you may be familiar with their sister venue in Hartford.

Also, if you want to stay for the later part of the Evening, Monday Night is Comedy Night at Koji !  Typically the Comedy starts at 10 pm, and currently this week it is planned to be Open Mic style.  (Does anyone in the group fancy themselves a Comedian?)

The Managers (Darren and Darra), have offered to extend the existing Happy Hour specials all night for our Group.  Currently the website has them listed as the following, but please double check for changes before ordering: $2 Domestics, $4 House Wines, $5 Saki-tini's, and discounted appetizers.

AJ will host this happy hour and can be reached at 315-345-9348 should you have any issues.

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host and/or we're most likely the largest group at the Bar on a Monday.
